images.caption: Figure 1:Average F1 score on ProcessBench(Zheng et al.,2024)versus estimated annotation cost.ActPRMoutperforms prior SOTA models while requiring merely 20% of the annotation costs.

header: 4Efficient Process Reward Labeling via Active Learning
